item.name: Broker_Event_505
item.description: Information An import to the local DB failed; see below for more information

item.name: Broker_Event_1169
item.description:
Controller {HOSTNAME} has entered the out-of-box grace period as no suitable licenses were found on the license server {$CTX_LIC_SRV}.
You have 281 hour(s) remaining before this controller stops providing desktop and application sessions.

item.name: Broker_Event_1170
item.description: The Citrix Broker Service has successfully detected suitable licenses on the license server 'dc01.lab.citrix24.ctx'. This controller is no longer in the out-of-box licensing grace period.

item.name: Broker_Event_1200
item.description: The connection between the Citrix Broker Service and the database has been restored.

item.name: Broker_Event_3500
item.description: The Citrix Broker Service has detected that the issue with communication with the database has been resolved and will resume normal brokering activity using configuration in the main site database.

item.name: Broker_Event_1201
item.description: The connection between the Citrix Broker Service and the database has been lost.

Controller {HOSTNAME} - no suitable licenses were found on the license server {$CTX_LIC_SRV}
trigger.description:
Controller {HOSTNAME} has entered the out-of-box grace period as no suitable licenses were found on the license server {$CTX_LIC_SRV}.
You have 281 hour(s) remaining before this controller stops providing desktop and application sessions.

trigger.name: Controller {HOSTNAME} cannot contact database server {$DB_SRV}
Controller {HOSTNAME} cannot contact the license server {$CTX_LIC_SRV}
trigger.description:
Controller {HOSTNAME} cannot contact the license server {$CTX_LIC_SRV}.
Please ensure that the license server is functioning correctly and that the details identifying the license server are correct in the XenDesktop configuration.

trigger.name: The Citrix Config Sync Service on {HOSTNAME} failed an import.
trigger.description:
Error details: Security identifier does not represent a Windows account
Solution: Remove an orphaned SID of user or security group which already got deleted in Active Directory. For more details visit: https://blog.citrix24.com/xendesktop-7-x-monitoring-template-delivery-controller/
